The competent authority has approved the extension of the facility, on medical
grounds, in respect of Dr. Karan Singh, President, Indian Council for Cultural Relations

tarmac during his departure / arrival by air at all airports in the country.
This issues with the approval of In-charge Commissioner of Security (Civil
Aviation).
